product_name: The North Face Glacier Track Fleece Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Glacier Track fleece jacket combines the warm comfort of a fleece coat with water-resistant nylon in key locations to guard against light rain. Lightweight polyester fleece is soft, durable and pill-resistant. Nylon chest and back overlay is treated with a Durable Water Repellant finish so water beads up and rolls off, keeping her dry in suddenly rainy conditions. 2 on-seam hand pockets provide easy storage; 1 zippered chest pocket secures small valuables and keeps them dry. The North Face Glacier Track fleece jacket features a full-length zipper with reflective zipper pull.
short_description: The North Face Glacier Track fleece jacket combines the warm comfort of a fleece coat with water-resistant nylon in key locations to guard against light rain.
